name: Apple Falling Details
message: Apple must fall down in steps of size 5.

name: Banana Falling Details
message: Banana must fall down in steps of size 7.

name: Apple Spawn Random X Position Constraint
Banana Spawn Random X Position Constraint
Apple Game Over Constraint
message: Score must not change after game is over (should be over).

name: Apple Game Over Message Constraint
message: Apple must display a message if it hits the ground.

name: Banana Bowl Points Constraint
message: Bananas must give 8 points when they hit the bowl.

name: Banana Ground Points Constraint
message: Bananas must subtract 8 points when they hit the floor.

name: Banana Ground Message Constraint
message: Banana must display a message when it hits the ground.
